titles.title: A joint resolution designating April 17-23, 1988, as "National Minority Cancer Awareness Week".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 2/17/1988--Introduced. Designates the week of April 17 through April 23, 1988, as National Minority Cancer Awareness Week.
